name: Easychat
tagline: A easy to use Chat tool to add a chatroom to your site.
body: # EasyChat Easy Chat is a simple Chat tool that enables the ability to place a chat on your website. There are two versions: -Community Chat -Customer Support Chat Each version has it's own set of features. This is simply a project created for me to learn. So here in the early days, some of the code is borrowed. A list of these are located Here
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
